newsitem.title: USA: UNILAB to take Q4 charge of about $4.5 mln.
newsitem.headline: UNILAB to take Q4 charge of about $4.5 mln.

text.p: UNILAB Corp said on Friday it would take a non-recurring charge of about $4.5 million in the fourth quarter in connection with the sale of participation interest in a promissory note.

The company said it had sold to Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Securities Corp, for $11 million cash, a 100 percent participation interest in its rights under a $15 million face value promissory note payable by Unilab Group Ltd and UniHolding Corp.
